Uses of Class
org.apache.sis.feature.AbstractFeature

Packages that use AbstractFeature
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.feature
Defines the structure and content of views of real-world phenomenon.
org.apache.sis.filter
Filters features according their properties.
org.apache.sis.gui.dataset
Widgets about data store resources and their metadata.
org.apache.sis.storage
Data store base types for retrieving and saving geospatial data in various storage formats.
org.apache.sis.storage.aggregate
Resources which are aggregations or concatenations of other resources.
